name: portfolio-web-dev-wff
description: Weng's Web Industry === Do you want to implement your idea into a reality on the world wide web? Or do you need an in house developer that can understand your business' vision, implement features, and fix bugs? This is a portfolio of my work...

scripts.build--help:
echo 'What happens when you run build script?
The build script will take your dev/src code and copy over to dev/build. Build will have scss folder and files removed. Lastly, build files are copied to root so you can deploy the entirety easily.'
scripts.build: rm -r dev/build; cp -rf dev/src dev/build; rm -r dev/build/assets/scss; cp -rf dev/build/* ./
